thread.title: Gold X2's Moss Gold Project Wins 2025 Rising Star Award at CenCan | GSHRF Stock News
thread.title_full: Gold X2's Moss Gold Project Wins 2025 Rising Star Award at CenCan | GSHRF Stock News

author: Stock Titan
title: Gold X2's Moss Gold Project Wins 2025 Rising Star Award at CenCan | GSHRF Stock News
text:
Gold X2 Receives the 2025 Rising Star Award for the Moss Gold Project at the Central Canada Resource Expo
Gold X2 Mining (OTCQB: GSHRF) has received the 2025 Rising Star Award at the Central Canada Resource Expo for its Moss Gold Project in Northwest Ontario. The award recognizes promising future mining leaders and producers in Northwestern Ontario.
The company's VP of Exploration, Pete Flindell, highlighted that this recognition validates their progress in de-risking the Moss Gold Project, with the ultimate goal of establishing it as one of Canada's top-10 producing gold mines.
Gold X2 Mining (OTCQB: GSHRF) ha ricevuto il Rising Star Award 2025 al Central Canada Resource Expo per il suo progetto Moss Gold nel Nord-Ovest dell'Ontario. Il premio premia i futuri protagonisti e produttori minerari più promettenti della regione.
Il vicepresidente dell'esplorazione dell'azienda, Pete Flindell, ha sottolineato che questo riconoscimento conferma i progressi compiuti nella riduzione dei rischi del progetto Moss Gold, con l'obiettivo finale di farne una delle dieci maggiori miniere d'oro produttrici del Canada.
Gold X2 Mining (OTCQB: GSHRF) recibió el Rising Star Award 2025 en el Central Canada Resource Expo por su proyecto Moss Gold en el noroeste de Ontario. El galardón reconoce a los futuros líderes y productores mineros más prometedores de la región.
El vicepresidente de Exploración de la compañía, Pete Flindell, destacó que este reconocimiento avala los avances realizados para mitigar los riesgos del proyecto Moss Gold, con la meta final de posicionarlo entre las 10 principales minas de oro productoras de Canadá.
Gold X2 Mining (OTCQB: GSHRF)는 노스웨스트 온타리오의 Moss Gold 프로젝트로 Central Canada Resource Expo에서 2025 Rising Star Award를 수상했습니다. 이 상은 북서부 온타리오에서 유망한 차세대 광산 리더와 생산자를 인정하는 상입니다.
회사의 탐사 부사장인 피트 플린델(Pete Flindell)은 이번 수상이 Moss Gold 프로젝트의 위험을 줄이기 위한 진전을 입증한다고 밝혔으며, 궁극적인 목표는 이를 캐나다의 상위 10대 금 생산 광산 중 하나로 만드는 것이라고 강조했습니다.
Gold X2 Mining (OTCQB: GSHRF) a reçu le Rising Star Award 2025 au Central Canada Resource Expo pour son projet Moss Gold dans le nord‑ouest de l'Ontario. Ce prix distingue les futurs leaders et producteurs miniers prometteurs de la région.
Le vice‑président Exploration de la société, Pete Flindell, a souligné que cette reconnaissance confirme les progrès réalisés pour diminuer les risques du projet Moss Gold, l'objectif ultime étant d'en faire l'une des 10 principales mines d'or productrices du Canada.
Gold X2 Mining (OTCQB: GSHRF) erhielt auf der Central Canada Resource Expo den Rising Star Award 2025 für sein Moss Gold-Projekt im Nordwesten Ontarios. Die Auszeichnung würdigt vielversprechende zukünftige Bergbaulinien und Produzenten in Nordwest-Ontario.
Der VP Exploration des Unternehmens, Pete Flindell, betonte, dass diese Anerkennung ihre Fortschritte bei der Risikominderung des Moss Gold-Projekts bestätigt, mit dem übergeordneten Ziel, es zu einer der Top-10 fördernden Goldminen Kanadas zu entwickeln.
- None.
- None.
Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - September 11, 2025) - Gold X2 Mining Inc. (TSXV: AUXX) (OTCQB: GSHRF) (FSE: DF8) ("Gold X2" or the "Company"), is pleased to announce the Company's Moss Gold Project in Northwest Ontario, Canada (the "Moss Gold Project") received the 2025 'Rising Star Award' at the Central Canada Resource Expo ("CenCan") held in Thunder Bay, Ontario, Canada.
Pete Flindell, VP of Exploration of Gold X2 commented, "We're honored to receive the 2025 Rising Star Award at CenCan, recognizing Ontario mining companies that demonstrate great promise as future leaders and producers in Northwestern Ontario. This award reinforces the significant progress our team has made over the past year as we wholistically de-risk the Moss Gold Project towards our goal of building a top-10 producing gold mine in Canada."
Gold X2 Mining would like to thank the CenCan committee and partners for the recognition and looks forward to continuing to build strong relationships with the local service providers through Northwestern Ontario.
About Gold X2 Mining
Gold X2 is a growth-oriented gold company focused on delivering long-term shareholder and stakeholder value through the acquisition and advancement of primary gold assets in tier-one jurisdictions. It is led by the ex-global head of structural geology for the world's largest gold company and backed by one of Canada's pre-eminent private equity firms. The Company's current focus is the advanced stage www.sedarplus.ca. For more information, please visit SEDAR+ (www.sedarplus.ca) and the Company's website (www.goldx2.com)
